ygData.subject: RE: Hidden Lava Tunnel in the temple of Sol Ro
ygData.msgSnippet: I noticed this in the Lava last night in the temple, it is under the bridge in the main chamber. You swim down and it takes you to a larger chamber, you have
ygData.messageBody:
I noticed this in the Lava last night in the temple, it is under the bridge
in the main chamber. You swim down and it takes you to a larger chamber,
you have to swim up the lavafall to get back out so I didn't want to stay
down there too long to look around. Anyone know what is down here, is it
just some crappy area that does nothing?

There is also a tunnel in Sol B that goes under the king room. I swam along
it once and came up in a small room (I guess it's somewhere to swim if you
can't get out of the lava).

I had a bad weekend though, died 3 times last night in Mistmoore whilst
camping the Cloaked Vampire (our monk tried to pull Lasna and kinda brought
the whole castle with him, was not a pretty sight. This happened twice, my
3rd death was for some unknown reason a damn caster saw me whilst f*cking
invis (in the area before the castle) and somehow killed me in one cast
while I was naked.

Stupid stupid game.

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 36 Songs <Guardians of Light>
